definitions.definition: Any member of a Bantu people from South Africa , most of whom live in the Eastern Cape .
The language of these people, a Bantu language related to Zulu .

main_definition: ( countable ) Any member of a Bantu people from South Africa , most of whom live in the Eastern Cape .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The language of these people, a Bantu language related to Zulu .
